name: Farmstead Story
description:
Farmstead Story is a farm simulation singe player card game.

It's up to you to keep the dream alive. Manage your family's abandoned farmstead and turn it into a sustainable home in a race against the clock (and the bills)! Plow, sow, water and harvest the land in order to grow and sell your produce; milk cows, raise chickens, play with your dog and much more!

Write your own farmstead story. Play our game now!

This game was created as part of Ludum Dare 46. The team is:

Lucas Lima
Luis Roveran
Thommaz Kauffmann
Ygor Speranza
